attributes.action: Re-Instate the Naval Reseve money stopped by the Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Men who signed on for 7 years with the Fleet and 5 years on the Reserve in the Royal Navy in the 1940's had their contracts broken by the Government and their money stopped after a few months into their Reseve time and should be compensated for this Robbery by the Government.
 Jim Bryson/Ex A/B 1947-1954
